xml:
Myfortic<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Renal transplantation

By mouth

  • Adult

    720 mg twice daily, to be started within 72 hours of transplantation.

Dose equivalence and conversion

Mycophenolic acid 720 mg is approximately equivalent to mycophenolate mofetil 1 g but avoid unnecessary switching because of pharmacokinetic differences.

 Conception and contraception

Manufacturer advises that men should use condoms during treatment and for 13 weeks after last dose.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
